articles.title: Asian markets tumble on Omicron spike, Biden spending bill blow - Philstar.com
articles.description: Fear ran high as equity markets took in the news of a global surge in coronavirus infections.
articles.content: HONG KONG, China — Asian stocks and oil prices sank Monday on fears about a fresh global surge in coronavirus infections and as the future of US President Joe Biden's massive social spending bill was… [+3784 chars]

articles.title: Indonesia hit back to reach Suzuki Cup semi-finals, Vietnam also through - CNA
articles.description:
Indonesia fought back after going a goal down to beat Malaysia 4-1 at the AFF Suzuki Cup 2020 in Singapore on Sunday (Dec 19) to progress to the semi-finals of the Southeast Asian championship alongside title-holders Vietnam.

Shin Tae-yong's side will take…
articles.content:
Malaysia went into their game against Indonesia needing to win to progress, and made the perfect start when Kogileswaran Raj's curling effort from distance beat Nadeo Argawinata in the 13th minute.
… [+1045 chars]

articles.title: Group aims to raise awareness of HPV in Singapore, hopes men get same access to vaccine as women - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - While the human papillomavirus (HPV) which can cause cancers can be prevented by vaccination, in Singapore, only women get this protection on a regular basis. One local group, the Alliance for Active Action Against HPV, is hoping to change this. L…
